It's been a while since we’ve gotten a real chance to talk.
Yeah it has, how have you been?
I've been thinking about how the world has changed since 2008, you know with the financial crisis and everything.
Me too, it feels like it changed so much about how we interact.
Definitely! Like, technology was already on the rise, but after that, it seemed to explode.
It's almost like people turned to online communities and social media for support when times were tough.
Exactly! Have you noticed how much more people rely on texting and messaging instead of face-to-face interaction?
Oh absolutely. Do you think that's a good thing or a bad thing?
I don't know, it's complicated. It's easier to connect with people online, but I wonder if it's making us disconnect in real life.
